duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop the Q-SYS loudspeaker portfolio, including small-format and large-format loudspeakers.
Propose design concepts and lead technical recommendations in collaboration with the Product Manager.
Model and prototype loudspeaker systems and their components, assessing technical feasibility.
Facilitate product development with other engineering functions and suppliers.
Solve technical problems, make decisions, and maintain ISO 9000 compliance.
Travel up to 10% of the time for domestic and international purposes.
Demonstrate knowledge of 3D modeling, 70V/100V commercial systems, UL1480/1480A, and acoustic measurements.
Supervise or perform all acoustic measurements related to projects, including crossover voicing and power testing.

education_certification.credential: BS in Acoustics or Mechanical Eng. MS Degree is a plus
